SEARCH
Package Controller

Class StateManager

java.lang.Object
Controller.StateManager
public class StateManager extends Object
This class creates every game state's model and view, the manages each state change.

    • changeState

      public void changeState(Stati nextState)
      Change the state of the view based on how the model's state has changed
      Parameters:
      nextState - : Based on the nextState value sets actualState which will be drawn in the view
